title: Goodhart's Law
description: "When a measure becomes a target, it ceases to be a good measure."

title: Streisand effect
description: An unintended consequence of attempting to hide or censor information that backfires, thereby increasing public awareness of the information.

title: The Moral Decline Phenomenon
description: A perception that morality is in decline that is likely an illusion, and a product of biased exposure to information and biased memory for information.

title: Cobra Effect
description: When an incentive unintentionally rewards people for making the issue worse.
